boons.name: Arcane Reflection
boons.description: Once per encounter, reflect a spell targeting you back at the caster.

boons.name: Temporal Shift
boons.description: Take two turns in a single round once per day.

boons.name: Unyielding Spirit
boons.description: Once per day, avoid being reduced below 1 hit point.

boons.name: Vampiric Grasp
boons.description: Recover temporary hit points equal to damage dealt by a melee critical hit.

boons.name: Planar Key
boons.description: Open portals to the Ethereal Plane at will.

boons.name: Chain Lightning
boons.description: Critical hits jump to a secondary target within 10 feet, dealing 1d8 lightning damage.

boons.name: Explosive Arrows
boons.description: Ranged attacks explode in a 5-foot radius, dealing splash damage equal to half the attack’s damage.

boons.name: Soulfire
boons.description: Killing an enemy causes them to explode in radiant flames, dealing 1d6 fire damage to adjacent creatures.

boons.name: Living Fortress
boons.description: Gain a +4 bonus to Fortitude saves against poisons or diseases.

boons.name: Ethereal Jaunt
boons.description: Once per encounter, teleport 60 feet to a location you can see, ignoring obstacles and terrain.

boons.name: Grave Resilience
boons.description: Reduce negative energy damage taken by 5.

boons.name: Blessing of the Tortoise
boons.description: Immune to forced movement effects.

boons.name: Death Sap
boons.description: Gain +1 to any ability for each enemy you kill (max 8.) You lose half of your stacks when knocked unconscious.

boons.name: Runic Compass
boons.description: Prevent hazards, traps and enemy encounters from appearing in mystery rooms. Once per level you can change a room to be a treasure room.

boons.name: Phase Step
boons.description: Once per day, become incorporeal for 1 minute.

boons.name: Eternal Vitality
boons.description: Automatically stabilize if reduced to 0 HP.

boons.name: Devastating Critical
boons.description: Increase the critical damage multiplier by 1 once per turn.

boons.name: Mystic Sight
boons.description: See invisible creatures within 60 feet.

boons.name: Bane of the Undead
boons.description: Weapon attacks deal 1d6 positive energy damage against undead.

boons.name: Explosive Finisher
boons.description: Add 1d8 fire damage to your final Strike in an attack action.

boons.name: Fang of the Beast
boons.description: Unarmed attacks gain the Deadly d10 trait.

boons.name: Thunderclap Blade
boons.description: Melee attacks cause a burst of sound, dealing 1d4 sonic damage to nearby enemies.

boons.name: Blessing of the Sea
boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to cold damage and treat all water as non-difficult terrain. Additionally, gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks made to Swim.

boons.name: Radiant Blade
boons.description: Your weapon glows, adding 1d4 positive energy damage to your attacks.

boons.name: Arcane Conduit
boons.description: Once per turn, after hitting an enemy with a melee attack, deal an additional 1d6 force damage to all adjacent enemies.

boons.name: Steel Resolve
boons.description: Gain a +1 status bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

boons.name: Runic Shell
boons.description: Gain temporary hit points equal to your level at the start of each turn.

boons.name: Shadow Cloak
boons.description: Once per day, turn invisible for 1 minute.

boons.name: Sundering Blows
boons.description: Gain a +4 circumstance bonus to damage when attacking objects or armor.

boons.name: Fiery Resolve
boons.description: Once per turn, convert 1d4 of your weapon damage to fire damage.

boons.name: Celestial Flame
boons.description: Your attacks deal 1d6 radiant damage to fiends.

boons.name: Sheltering Shadows
boons.description: Gain concealment (DC 11 flat check) in dim light or darkness.

boons.name: Blessing of the Faithful
boons.description: Automatically succeed on your first saving throw against a spell each day.

boons.name: Mystic Archer
boons.description: Your ranged attacks gain a +1 circumstance bonus to hit, and critical hits reduce the target's Speed by 10 feet for 1 round.

boons.name: Gravity’s Pull
boons.description: Targets struck by you are pulled 5 feet closer.

boons.name: Draconic Scales
boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage.

boons.name: Unseen Steps
boons.description: Gain the effects of Pass Without Trace constantly.

boons.name: Fortified Mind
boons.description: Gain a +1 status bonus to saves against mental effects.

boons.name: Quickened Steps
boons.description: Gain a +10-foot bonus to Speed.

boons.name: Phantasmal Barrage
boons.description: Illusory duplicates of your weapon attack adjacent enemies, dealing 1d6 damage.

boons.name: Stone Skin
boons.description: Gain resistance 3 to physical damage.

boons.name: Razor's Edge
boons.description: Gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with slashing weapons.

boons.name: Thunderous Impact
boons.description: Add 1d8 sonic damage to melee or ranged critical hits.

boons.name: Venomous Touch
boons.description: Critical hits with melee weapons apply the poisoned 1 condition.

boons.name: Dizzying Strikes
boons.description: On a critical hit, impose the flat-footed condition for 1 round.

boons.name: Adaptive Ward
boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to the last damage type that hit you for 1 round.

boons.name: Blessing of the Wild
boons.description: Once per day, summon an animal companion for 10 minutes as if using the Animal Ally feat.

boons.name: Quick Drawmastery
boons.description: Gain a +2 status bonus to hit on attacks made immediately after drawing a weapon.

boons.name: Eternal Bond
boons.description: Adjacent allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

boons.name: Mirror Form
boons.description: Once per day, create an illusory duplicate that causes an attack to miss.

boons.name: Icebound Aegis
boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to cold damage and immunity to environmental cold.

boons.name: Blazing Heart
boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to fire damage and immunity to environmental heat.

boons.name: True Strike Mastery
boons.description: Once per day, cast True Strike as a free action.

boons.name: Poison Mastery
boons.description: Add 1d6 persistent poison damage to your weapon attacks.

boons.name: Divine Wrath
boons.description: Once per day, deal an extra 3d6 damage to a creature with an opposing alignment.

boons.name: Frostbite
boons.description: Attacks reduce the target’s Speed by 5 feet for 1 round.

boons.name: Spectral Precision
boons.description: Ranged attacks target touch AC against incorporeal creatures.

boons.name: Ghost Hunter
boons.description: Weapons deal full damage to incorporeal creatures.

boons.name: Hunter’s Instinct
boons.description: Your attacks ignore the effects of concealment.

boons.name: Piercing Vision
boons.description: Ranged attacks ignore total concealment within 30 feet.

boons.name: Second Wind
boons.description: Recover 10 hit points as a free action once per encounter.

boons.name: Indomitable Will
boons.description: Gain a +2 status bonus to Will saves.

boons.name: Timeless Body
boons.description: Gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves and resistance 3 to poison and disease.

boons.name: Ethereal Bond
boons.description: Communicate with spirits or ghosts at will.

boons.name: Divine Recall
boons.description: Reroll one failed saving throw or skill check per day.

boons.name: Shatterer
boons.description: Weapon attacks ignore hardness less than 10.

boons.name: Arcane Feedback
boons.description: Spells that deal damage add 1d6 of the same type of damage.

boons.name: Blessing of the Tortoise
boons.description: Immune to forced movement effects.

boons.name: Warden’s Guide
boons.description: Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Nature checks and your attacks deal an extra 1d6 damage against beasts.

boons.name: Phantom Dodge
boons.description: Move 5 feet as a free action once per round after being attacked.

boons.name: Stone Skin
boons.description: Gain resistance 3 to physical damage.

boons.name: Razor's Edge
boons.description: Gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with slashing weapons.

boons.name: Thunderous Impact
boons.description: Add 1d8 sonic damage to melee or ranged critical hits.

boons.name: Venomous Touch
boons.description: Critical hits with melee weapons apply the poisoned 1 condition.

boons.name: Dizzying Strikes
boons.description: On a critical hit, impose the flat-footed condition for 1 round.

boons.name: Adaptive Ward
boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to the last damage type that hit you for 1 round.

boons.name: Blessing of the Wild
boons.description: Once per day, summon an animal companion for 10 minutes as if using the Animal Ally feat.

boons.description: Gain a +2 status bonus to hit on attacks made immediately after drawing a weapon.

boons.name: Eternal Bond
boons.description: Adjacent allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

boons.description: Once per day, create an illusory duplicate that causes an attack to miss.

boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to cold damage and immunity to environmental cold.

boons.description: Gain resistance 5 to fire damage and immunity to environmental heat.

boons.description: Once per day, cast True Strike as a free action.

boons.description: Add 1d6 persistent poison damage to your weapon attacks.

boons.name: Divine Wrath
boons.description: Once per day, deal an extra 3d6 damage to a creature with an opposing alignment.

boons.name: Spectral Precision
boons.description: Ranged attacks target touch AC against incorporeal creatures.

boons.name: Ghost Hunter
boons.description: Weapons deal full damage to incorporeal creatures.

boons.name: Hunter’s Instinct
boons.description: Your attacks ignore the effects of concealment.

boons.name: Piercing Vision

boons.name: Second Wind
boons.description: Recover 10 hit points as a free action once per encounter.

boons.name: Indomitable Will
boons.description: Gain a +2 status bonus to Will saves.

boons.name: Timeless Body
boons.description: Your body ages slower; halve the effects of aging penalties.

boons.name: Ethereal Bond
boons.description: Communicate with spirits or ghosts at will.

boons.name: Divine Recall
boons.description: Reroll one failed saving throw or skill check per day.

boons.name: Shatterer
boons.description: Weapon attacks ignore hardness less than 10.

boons.name: Arcane Feedback
boons.description: Spells that deal damage add 1d6 of the same type of damage.

boons.name: Blessing of the Tortoise
boons.description: Immune to forced movement effects.

boons.name: Warden’s Guide
boons.description: Once per day, gain the benefits of Speak with Animals for 10 minutes.

boons.name: Phantom Dodge
boons.description: Move 5 feet as a free action once per round after being attacked.
